Name: Tackle
Info: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

Name: Growl
Info: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

Name: Leech Seed
Info: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

Name: Vine Whip
Info: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

Name: Poison Powder
Info: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target. It may poison the target.

Name: Sleep Powder
Info: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

Name: Take Down
Info: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

Name: Razor Leaf
Info: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Sweet Scent
Info: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

Name: Growth
Info: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Name: Double-Edge
Info: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

Name: Worry Seed
Info: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making its Ability Insomnia.

Name: Synthesis
Info: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

Name: Seed Bomb
Info: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

Name: Toxic
Info: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

Name: Venoshock
Info: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

Name: Hidden Power
Info: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pokémon using it.

Name: Sunny Day
Info: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

Name: Light Screen
Info: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

Name: Protect
Info: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Name: Safeguard
Info: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

Name: Frustration
Info: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

Name: Solar Beam
Info: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

Name: Return
Info: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

Name: Double Team
Info: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

Name: Sludge Bomb
Info: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

Name: Facade
Info: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or has paralysis.

Name: Rest
Info: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

Name: Attract
Info: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

Name: Round
Info: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

Name: Echoed Voice
Info: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.

Name: Energy Ball
Info: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

Name: Flash
Info: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.

Name: Swords Dance
Info: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

Name: Grass Knot
Info: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the damage.

Name: Swagger
Info: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

Name: Sleep Talk
Info: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

Name: Substitute
Info: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

Name: Rock Smash
Info: The user attacks with a punch that can shatter a rock. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Name: Nature Power
Info: An attack that makes use of nature's power. Its effects vary depending on the user's environment.

Name: Confide
Info: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Cut
Info: The target is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.

Name: Strength
Info: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. It can also be used to move heavy boulders.

Name: Amnesia
Info: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

Name: Charm
Info: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

Name: Curse
Info: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

Name: Endure
Info: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Name: Giga Drain
Info: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Name: Grass Whistle
Info: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

Name: Grassy Terrain
Info: The user turns the ground under everyone's feet to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn.

Name: Ingrain
Info: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can't switch out.

Name: Leaf Storm
Info: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Magical Leaf
Info: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack will not miss.

Name: Petal Dance
Info: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

Name: Power Whip
Info: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the target.

Name: Skull Bash
Info: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

Name: Sludge
Info: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

Name: Petal Blizzard
Info: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

Name: Roar
Info: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Name: Hyper Beam
Info: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

Name: Earthquake
Info: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

Name: Giga Impact
Info: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

Name: Bulldoze
Info: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is reduced.

Name: Scratch
Info: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

Name: Ember
Info: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Name: Smokescreen
Info: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the target's accuracy.

Name: Dragon Rage
Info: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

Name: Scary Face
Info: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

Name: Fire Fang
Info: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.

Name: Flame Burst
Info: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

Name: Slash
Info: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Flamethrower
Info: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Name: Fire Spin
Info: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

Name: Inferno
Info: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.

Name: Hone Claws
Info: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

Name: Dragon Claw
Info: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

Name: Dig
Info: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

Name: Brick Break
Info: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

Name: Fire Blast
Info: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Name: Rock Tomb
Info: Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target's Speed by preventing its movement.

Name: Aerial Ace
Info: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.

Name: Flame Charge
Info: The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user's Speed stat.

Name: Overheat
Info: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Fling
Info: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

Name: Incinerate
Info: The user attacks opposing Pokemon with fire. If a Pokemon is holding a certain item, such as a berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable

Name: Will-O-Wisp
Info: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

Name: Shadow Claw
Info: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Rock Slide
Info: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.

Name: Power-Up Punch
Info: Striking opponents over and over makes the user's fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

Name: Air Cutter
Info: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Ancient Power
Info: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

Name: Beat Up
Info: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

Name: Belly Drum
Info: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

Name: Bite
Info: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

Name: Counter
Info: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

Name: Crunch
Info: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Name: Dragon Dance
Info: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

Name: Dragon Pulse
Info: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

Name: Dragon Rush
Info: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Flare Blitz
Info: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The user sustains serious damage and may leave the target burned.

Name: Focus Punch
Info: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.

Name: Metal Claw
Info: The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat.

Name: Outrage
Info: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

Name: Heat Wave
Info: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing team. It may also leave targets with a burn.

Name: Air Slash
Info: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Wing Attack
Info: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

Name: Roost
Info: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

Name: Steel Wing
Info: The target is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user's Defense stat.

Name: Focus Blast
Info: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

Name: Sky Drop
Info: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

Name: Dragon Tail
Info: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Name: Fly
Info: The user soars, then strikes its target on the second turn. It can also be used for flying to any familiar town.

Name: Tail Whip
Info: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

Name: Water Gun
Info: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

Name: Withdraw
Info: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

Name: Bubble
Info: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' Speed stats.

Name: Rapid Spin
Info: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

Name: Water Pulse
Info: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

Name: Aqua Tail
Info: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

Name: Iron Defense
Info: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

Name: Rain Dance
Info: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

Name: Hydro Pump
Info: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

Name: Hail
Info: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

Name: Ice Beam
Info: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

Name: Blizzard
Info: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.

Name: Scald
Info: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Name: Gyro Ball
Info: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

Name: Surf
Info: It swamps the area around the user with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.

Name: Waterfall
Info: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

Name: Aqua Jet
Info: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

Name: Aqua Ring
Info: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.

Name: Aura Sphere
Info: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This move is certain to hit.

Name: Brine
Info: If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

Name: Fake Out
Info: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

Name: Flail
Info: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

Name: Foresight
Info: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

Name: Haze
Info: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

Name: Mirror Coat
Info: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

Name: Mist
Info: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

Name: Mud Sport
Info: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.

Name: Muddy Water
Info: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' accuracy.

Name: Refresh
Info: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

Name: Water Spout
Info: The user spouts water to damage the opposing team. The lower the user's HP, the less powerful it becomes.

Name: Yawn
Info: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

Name: Flash Cannon
Info: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Name: Smack Down
Info: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit.

Name: Dark Pulse
Info: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: String Shot
Info: The targets are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth. This silk reduces the targets' Speed stat.

Name: Bug Bite
Info: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

Name: Harden
Info: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

Name: Confusion
Info: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

Name: Stun Spore
Info: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Gust
Info: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

Name: Supersonic
Info: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

Name: Whirlwind
Info: The target is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Name: Psybeam
Info: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

Name: Silver Wind
Info: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user's stats.

Name: Tailwind
Info: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for four turns.

Name: Rage Powder
Info: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.

Name: Captivate
Info: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target is charmed into harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Bug Buzz
Info: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Name: Quiver Dance
Info: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. It boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

Name: Psychic
Info: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

Name: Shadow Ball
Info: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Name: Thief
Info: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. It can't steal if the user holds an item.

Name: Acrobatics
Info: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

Name: Struggle Bug
Info: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

Name: Psych Up
Info: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

Name: Infestation
Info: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this time.

Name: Dream Eater
Info: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user's HP.

Name: U-turn
Info: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Name: Poison Sting
Info: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

Name: Fury Attack
Info: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

Name: Focus Energy
Info: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

Name: Twineedle
Info: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. It may also poison the target.

Name: Rage
Info: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

Name: Pursuit
Info: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

Name: Toxic Spikes
Info: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the opponent's feet. They poison opponents that switch into battle.

Name: Pin Missile
Info: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

Name: Agility
Info: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

Name: Assurance
Info: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

Name: Poison Jab
Info: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the target.

Name: Endeavor
Info: An attack move that cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

Name: Fell Stinger
Info: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises sharply.

Name: False Swipe
Info: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

Name: Payback
Info: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

Name: X-Scissor
Info: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

Name: Sand Attack
Info: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

Name: Quick Attack
Info: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

Name: Twister
Info: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing team. It may also make targets flinch.

Name: Feather Dance
Info: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

Name: Mirror Move
Info: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

Name: Hurricane
Info: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.

Name: Brave Bird
Info: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.

Name: Defog
Info: A strong wind blows away the target's obstacles such as Reflect or Light Screen. It also lowers the target's evasiveness.

Name: Feint Attack
Info: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

Name: Uproar
Info: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

Name: Hyper Fang
Info: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Sucker Punch
Info: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

Name: Super Fang
Info: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target's HP to half.

Name: Taunt
Info: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

Name: Thunderbolt
Info: A strong electric blast is loosed at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Thunder
Info: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Charge Beam
Info: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Retaliate
Info: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack's damage increases.

Name: Thunder Wave
Info: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

Name: Wild Charge
Info: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. It also damages the user a little.

Name: Final Gambit
Info: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to the user's HP.

Name: Flame Wheel
Info: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Name: Fury Swipes
Info: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

Name: Last Resort
Info: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

Name: Me First
Info: The user tries to cut ahead of the target to steal and use the target's intended move with greater power.

Name: Revenge
Info: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

Name: Reversal
Info: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

Name: Screech
Info: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

Name: Peck
Info: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

Name: Leer
Info: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

Name: Drill Peck
Info: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

Name: Astonish
Info: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Razor Wind
Info: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Sky Attack
Info: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Tri Attack
Info: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Drill Run
Info: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Pluck
Info: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

Name: Wrap
Info: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

Name: Glare
Info: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

Name: Acid
Info: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. The acid may also lower the targets' Sp. Def stats.

Name: Stockpile
Info: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

Name: Swallow
Info: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

Name: Spit Up
Info: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the damage.

Name: Acid Spray
Info: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

Name: Mud Bomb
Info: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

Name: Gastro Acid
Info: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

Name: Belch
Info: The user lets out a damaging belch on the target. The user must eat a Berry to use this move.

Name: Coil
Info: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

Name: Gunk Shot
Info: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. It may also poison the target.

Name: Sludge Wave
Info: It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit.

Name: Torment
Info: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

Name: Disable
Info: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

Name: Iron Tail
Info: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Name: Poison Fang
Info: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. It may also leave the target badly poisoned.

Name: Poison Tail
Info: The user hits the target with its tail. It may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Slam
Info: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

Name: Snatch
Info: The user steals the effects of any healing or stat-changing move the opponent attempts to use.

Name: Spite
Info: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

Name: Switcheroo
Info: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

Name: Ice Fang
Info: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

Name: Thunder Fang
Info: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

Name: Thunder Shock
Info: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Play Nice
Info: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

Name: Electro Ball
Info: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.

Name: Nuzzle
Info: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

Name: Feint
Info: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

Name: Discharge
Info: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.

Name: Volt Switch
Info: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Name: Bestow
Info: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.

Name: Bide
Info: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

Name: Charge
Info: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

Name: Disarming Voice
Info: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

Name: Double Slap
Info: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

Name: Encore
Info: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

Name: Lucky Chant
Info: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.

Name: Present
Info: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.

Name: Thunder Punch
Info: The target is punched with an electrified fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Tickle
Info: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

Name: Wish
Info: One turn after this move is used, the target's HP is restored by half the user's maximum HP.

Name: Volt Tackle
Info: The user electrifies itself, then charges.  It causes considerable damage to the user and may leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Sweet Kiss
Info: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

Name: Nasty Plot
Info: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

Name: Defense Curl
Info: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

Name: Rollout
Info: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

Name: Swift
Info: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack never misses.

Name: Fury Cutter
Info: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.

Name: Magnitude
Info: The user looses a ground-shaking quake affecting everyone around the user. Its power varies.

Name: Sand Tomb
Info: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

Name: Sandstorm
Info: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

Name: Chip Away
Info: Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

Name: Crush Claw
Info: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. It may also lower the target's Defense.

Name: Mud Shot
Info: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. It also reduces the target's Speed.

Name: Night Slash
Info: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Rock Climb
Info: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. It may also confuse the target.

Name: Rototiller
Info: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.

Name: Stone Edge
Info: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Name: Double Kick
Info: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

Name: Helping Hand
Info: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

Name: Flatter
Info: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, it also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Venom Drench
Info: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

Name: Superpower
Info: The user attacks the target with great power. However, it also lowers the user's Attack and Defense.

Name: Body Slam
Info: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Earth Power
Info: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

Name: Quash
Info: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

Name: Horn Attack
Info: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

Name: Horn Drill
Info: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. If it hits, the target faints instantly.

Name: Head Smash
Info: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. The user also takes terrible damage.

Name: Megahorn
Info: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

Name: Thrash
Info: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

Name: After You
Info: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

Name: Healing Wish
Info: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

Name: Pound
Info: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

Name: Sing
Info: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

Name: Follow Me
Info: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

Name: Wake-Up Slap
Info: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.

Name: Minimize
Info: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

Name: Stored Power
Info: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the damage.

Name: Metronome
Info: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

Name: Cosmic Power
Info: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Name: Moonlight
Info: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

Name: Moonblast
Info: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Gravity
Info: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitate.

Name: Meteor Mash
Info: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user's Attack.

Name: Psyshock
Info: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

Name: Calm Mind
Info: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

Name: Reflect
Info: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

Name: Dazzling Gleam
Info: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

Name: Aromatherapy
Info: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user's party.

Name: Covet
Info: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

Name: Fake Tears
Info: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

Name: Heal Pulse
Info: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP.

Name: Mimic
Info: The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.

Name: Misty Terrain
Info: The user covers the ground under everyone's feet with mist for five turns. This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions.

Name: Splash
Info: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

Name: Copycat
Info: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

Name: Wake-up Slap
Info: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.

Name: Baby-Doll Eyes
Info: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

Name: Confuse Ray
Info: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

Name: Imprison
Info: If the opponents know any move also known by the user, the opponents are prevented from using it.

Name: Hex
Info: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.

Name: Extrasensory
Info: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Grudge
Info: If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent's move that knocked it out.

Name: Howl
Info: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

Name: Hypnosis
Info: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

Name: Power Swap
Info: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the target.

Name: Secret Power
Info: The user attacks the target with a secret power. Its added effects vary depending on the user's environment.

Name: Tail Slap
Info: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

Name: Baby-doll Eyes
Info: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

Name: Will-o-wisp
Info: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

Name: Hyper Voice
Info: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

Name: Perish Song
Info: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

Name: Punishment
Info: This attack's power increases the more the target has powered up with stat changes.

Name: Play Rough
Info: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

Name: Leech Life
Info: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Name: Mean Look
Info: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

Name: Zen Headbutt
Info: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Absorb
Info: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Name: Mega Drain
Info: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Name: Natural Gift
Info: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

Name: Teeter Dance
Info: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pokémon around it.

Name: Spore
Info: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

Name: Cross Poison
Info: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also leave the target poisoned. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Wide Guard
Info: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

Name: Signal Beam
Info: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. It may also confuse the target.

Name: Baton Pass
Info: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

Name: Morning Sun
Info: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

Name: Skill Swap
Info: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

Name: Mud-Slap
Info: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

Name: Fissure
Info: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target instantly faints if it hits.

Name: Headbutt
Info: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Memento
Info: The user faints when using this move. In return, it harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk.

Name: Pay Day
Info: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

Name: Assist
Info: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by other Pokémon in the party.

Name: Foul Play
Info: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage.

Name: Odor Sleuth
Info: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

Name: Power Gem
Info: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

Name: Embargo
Info: It prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

Name: Water Sport
Info: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.

Name: Soak
Info: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

Name: Wonder Room
Info: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

Name: Clear Smog
Info: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal.

Name: Cross Chop
Info: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Future Sight
Info: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

Name: Simple Beam
Info: The user's mysterious psychic wave changes the target's Ability to Simple.

Name: Synchronoise
Info: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

Name: Low Sweep
Info: The user attacks the target's legs swiftly, reducing the target's Speed stat.

Name: Low Kick
Info: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. It inflicts greater damage on heavier targets.

Name: Karate Chop
Info: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Seismic Toss
Info: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

Name: Close Combat
Info: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

Name: Bulk Up
Info: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.

Name: Meditate
Info: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

Name: Smelling Salts
Info: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. It also cures the target's paralysis, however.

Name: Snarl
Info: The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the target's Sp. Atk stat decrease.

Name: Extreme Speed
Info: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

Name: Bubble Beam
Info: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the opposing team. It may also lower their Speed stats.

Name: Ice Ball
Info: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

Name: Mind Reader
Info: The user senses the target's movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

Name: Circle Throw
Info: The user throws the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Name: Submission
Info: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.

Name: Dynamic Punch
Info: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. It confuses the target if it hits.

Name: Teleport
Info: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.

Name: Trick Room
Info: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

Name: Ally Switch
Info: The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies.

Name: Barrier
Info: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

Name: Fire Punch
Info: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Name: Guard Split
Info: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target's.

Name: Guard Swap
Info: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the target.

Name: Ice Punch
Info: The target is punched with an icy fist. It may also leave the target frozen.

Name: Knock Off
Info: The user slaps down the target's held item, preventing that item from being used in the battle.

Name: Power Trick
Info: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat.

Name: Psycho Shift
Info: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.

Name: Kinesis
Info: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. It lowers the target's accuracy.

Name: Miracle Eye
Info: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

Name: Telekinesis
Info: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

Name: Recover
Info: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

Name: Psycho Cut
Info: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Role Play
Info: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's natural Ability.

Name: Trick
Info: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

Name: Vital Throw
Info: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move is guaranteed not to miss.

Name: Bullet Punch
Info: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

Name: Heavy Slam
Info: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage.

Name: Quick Guard
Info: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

Name: Rolling Kick
Info: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Wring Out
Info: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater this attack's power.

Name: Bullet Seed
Info: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.

Name: Weather Ball
Info: An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather.

Name: Leaf Tornado
Info: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target's accuracy.

Name: Leaf Blade
Info: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Constrict
Info: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target's Speed stat.

Name: Acupressure
Info: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats.

Name: Aurora Beam
Info: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

Name: Reflect Type
Info: The user reflects the target's type, making it the same type as the target.

Name: Rock Polish
Info: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

Name: Rock Throw
Info: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

Name: Rock Blast
Info: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.

Name: Self-Destruct
Info: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

Name: Stealth Rock
Info: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opponent's team. The trap hurts opponents that switch into battle.

Name: Explosion
Info: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.

Name: Autotomize
Info: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

Name: Block
Info: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

Name: Hammer Arm
Info: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

Name: Mega Punch
Info: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

Name: Steamroller
Info: The user crushes its targets by rolling over them with its rolled-up body. This attack may make the target flinch.

Name: Stomp
Info: The target is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Bounce
Info: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Slack Off
Info: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP.

Name: Snore
Info: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

Name: Sonic Boom
Info: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

Name: Magnet Bomb
Info: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack will not miss.

Name: Spark
Info: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Mirror Shot
Info: The user looses a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

Name: Metal Sound
Info: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

Name: Lock-On
Info: The user takes sure aim at the target. It ensures the next attack does not fail to hit the target.

Name: Magnet Rise
Info: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

Name: Zap Cannon
Info: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

Name: Electric Terrain
Info: The user electrifies the ground under everyone's feet for five turns.  Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

Name: Trump Card
Info: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its attack power.

Name: Double Hit
Info: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

Name: Icy Wind
Info: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also reduces the targets' Speed stat.

Name: Ice Shard
Info: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

Name: Dive
Info: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the second turn. It can be used to dive deep in the ocean.

Name: Entrainment
Info: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

Name: Icicle Spear
Info: The user launches sharp icicles at the target. It strikes two to five times in a row.

Name: Lick
Info: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Sheer Cold
Info: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.

Name: Frost Breath
Info: The user blows a cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

Name: Poison Gas
Info: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. It may poison those hit.

Name: Acid Armor
Info: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

Name: Shadow Punch
Info: The user throws a punch from the shadows. The punch lands without fail.

Name: Shadow Sneak
Info: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

Name: Clamp
Info: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

Name: Razor Shell
Info: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This attack may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Name: Whirlpool
Info: Traps foes in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns.

Name: Shell Smash
Info: The user breaks its shell, lowering its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

Name: Avalanche
Info: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

Name: Spike Cannon
Info: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

Name: Spikes
Info: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team's feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.

Name: Icicle Crash
Info: The user attacks by harshly dropping an icicle onto the target. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Night Shade
Info: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user's level.

Name: Destiny Bond
Info: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.

Name: Nightmare
Info: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

Name: Psywave
Info: The target is attacked with an odd  psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

Name: Smog
Info: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

Name: Bind
Info: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

Name: Dragon Breath
Info: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Vice Grip
Info: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

Name: Guillotine
Info: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target will faint instantly if this attack hits.

Name: Crabhammer
Info: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Eerie Impulse
Info: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Magnetic Flux
Info: The user manipulates magnetic fields which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

Name: Barrage
Info: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

Name: Egg Bomb
Info: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

Name: Wood Hammer
Info: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.

Name: Bone Club
Info: The user clubs the target with a bone. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Bonemerang
Info: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the target twice, coming and going.

Name: Bone Rush
Info: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

Name: Detect
Info: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Name: Iron Head
Info: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Mega Kick
Info: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

Name: Jump Kick
Info: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

Name: High Jump Kick
Info: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

Name: Blaze Kick
Info: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Name: Mach Punch
Info: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.

Name: Vacuum Wave
Info: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

Name: Comet Punch
Info: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

Name: Sky Uppercut
Info: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

Name: Pain Split
Info: The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.

Name: Metal Burst
Info: The user retaliates with much greater power against the target that last inflicted damage on it.

Name: Soft-Boiled
Info: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. May also be used in the field to heal HP.

Name: Heal Bell
Info: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status problems of all the party Pokémon.

Name: Dizzy Punch
Info: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches that may also leave it confused.

Name: Octazooka
Info: The user attacks by spraying ink in the target's face or eyes. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

Name: Camouflage
Info: The user's type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water's edge, in grass, or in a cave.

Name: Recycle
Info: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

Name: Magic Room
Info: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

Name: Power Split
Info: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target's.

Name: Draining Kiss
Info: The user steals the target's energy with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

Name: Lovely Kiss
Info: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

Name: Powder Snow
Info: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.

Name: Heart Stamp
Info: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Shock Wave
Info: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.

Name: Lava Plume
Info: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave targets with a burn.

Name: Storm Throw
Info: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

Name: Work Up
Info: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

Name: Freeze-Dry
Info: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

Name: Transform
Info: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

Name: Double-edge
Info: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

Name: Conversion 2
Info: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.

Name: Conversion
Info: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.

Name: Sharpen
Info: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.

Name: Magic Coat
Info: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

Name: Self-destruct
Info: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

Name: Psystrike
Info: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

Name: Eruption
Info: The user attacks the opposing team with explosive fury. The lower the user's HP, the less powerful this attack becomes.

Name: Drain Punch
Info: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Name: Spider Web
Info: The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can't flee from battle.

Name: Sticky Web
Info: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.

Name: Electroweb
Info: The user captures and attacks opposing Pokémon by using an electric net. It reduces the targets' Speed stat.

Name: Ion Deluge
Info: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

Name: Fairy Wind
Info: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

Name: Ominous Wind
Info: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

Name: Cotton Spore
Info: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the target, harshly reducing its Speed stat.

Name: Cotton Guard
Info: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically raising the user's Defense stat.

Name: Flower Shield
Info: The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

Name: Arm Thrust
Info: The user looses a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

Name: Lock-on
Info: The user takes sure aim at the target. It ensures the next attack does not fail to hit the target.

Name: Sketch
Info: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

Name: Triple Kick
Info: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each  successive hit.

Name: Milk Drink
Info: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. May also be used in the field to heal HP.

Name: Sacred Fire
Info: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Name: Aeroblast
Info: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Heal Block
Info: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

Name: Boomburst
Info: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

Name: Force Palm
Info: The target is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Mud-slap
Info: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

Name: Phantom Force
Info: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

Name: Tail Glow
Info: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Needle Arm
Info: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. It may also make the target flinch.

Name: Mist Ball
Info: A mistlike flurry of down envelops and damages the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Atk.

Name: Luster Purge
Info: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

Name: Doom Desire
Info: Two turns after this move is used, the user blasts the target with a concentrated bundle of light.

Name: Psycho Boost
Info: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Defend Order
Info: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Name: Heal Order
Info: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

Name: Attack Order
Info: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Chatter
Info: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the target.

Name: Dual Chop
Info: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

Name: Rock Wrecker
Info: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.

Name: Roar of Time
Info: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.

Name: Spacial Rend
Info: The user tears the target along with the space around it. Critical hits land more easily.

Name: Magma Storm
Info: The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for four to five turns.

Name: Crush Grip
Info: The target is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the target has left.

Name: Shadow Force
Info: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the second turn. It hits even if the target protects itself.

Name: Lunar Dance
Info: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

Name: Heart Swap
Info: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

Name: Dark Void
Info: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.

Name: Seed Flare
Info: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. It may harshly lower the target's Sp. Def.

Name: Judgment
Info: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.

Name: Searing Shot
Info: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave targets with a burn.

Name: Heat Crash
Info: The user slams its target with its flame- covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the damage.

Name: Night Daze
Info: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

Name: Horn Leech
Info: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

Name: Gear Grind
Info: The user attacks by throwing two steel gears at its target.

Name: Shift Gear
Info: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack and sharply raising its Speed.

Name: Head Charge
Info: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. It also damages the user a little.

Name: Fiery Dance
Info: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. It may also raise the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Sacred Sword
Info: The user attacks by slicing with its long horns. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

Name: Fusion Flare
Info: The user brings down a giant flame. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous thunderbolt.

Name: Blue Flare
Info: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn.

Name: Fusion Bolt
Info: The user throws down a giant thunderbolt. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous flame.

Name: Bolt Strike
Info: The user charges its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. It may leave the target with paralysis.

Name: Glaciate
Info: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This attack reduces the targets' Speed stat.

Name: Techno Blast
Info: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.

Name: Spiky Shield
Info: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.

Name: Mystical Fire
Info: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Name: Mat Block
Info: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.

Name: Water Shuriken
Info: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

Name: Powder
Info: The user covers the target in a powder that explodes and damages the target if it uses a Fire-type move.

Name: Noble Roar
Info: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Name: Parting Shot
Info: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.

Name: King's Shield
Info: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack stat of any attacker who makes direct contact.

Name: Aromatic Mist
Info: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of ally Pokémon with a mysterious aroma.

Name: Topsy-Turvy
Info: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

Name: Parabolic Charge
Info: The user attacks everything around it. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

Name: Electrify
Info: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target's move becomes Electric type.

Name: Flying Press
Info: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

Name: Fairy Lock
Info: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

Name: Crafty Shield
Info: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.

Name: Forest's Curse
Info: The user puts a forest curse on the target. Afflicted targets are now Grass type as well.

Name: Trick-or-Treat
Info: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target's type.

Name: Geomancy
Info: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

Name: Oblivion Wing
Info: The user absorbs its target's HP. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

Name: Land's Wrath
Info: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

Name: Diamond Storm
Info: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also raise the user's Defense stat.
